body.bibl: Baker, Aelred. “The Significance of the New Testament Text of the Syriac Liber Graduum.” In Studia Evangelica, Vol. V: Papers Presented to the Third International Congress on New Testament Studies Held at Christ Church, Oxford, 1965.
